alan-wake-ii.name: Alan Wake 2
alan-wake-ii.story: Alan Wake 2 is a sequel to the 2010 psychological horror game Alan Wake. The game follows Alan Wake as he investigates a series of disappearances in Bright Falls, Washington.
alan-wake-ii.gameplay: Alan Wake 2 is a third-person action-adventure game with a focus on psychological horror. The game features a dark and atmospheric world, as well as a variety of weapons and abilities to use against the game's enemies.

baldurs-gate-3.name: Baldur's Gate 3
baldurs-gate-3.story: Baldur's Gate 3 is a sequel to the Dungeons & Dragons role-playing game Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn. The game follows a group of adventurers as they explore the world of Faer√ªn.
baldurs-gate-3.gameplay: Baldur's Gate 3 is a turn-based role-playing game with a focus on tactical combat. The game features a variety of classes, races, and abilities to choose from, as well as a large and open world to explore.

marvels-spider-man-2.name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2
marvels-spider-man-2.story: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 is a sequel to the 2018 action-adventure game Marvel's Spider-Man. The game follows Peter Parker and Miles Morales as they face a new villain, Kraven the Hunter.
marvels-spider-man-2.gameplay: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 is a third-person action-adventure game with a focus on web-slinging and combat. The game features a new skill tree for each character, as well as a variety of new gadgets and abilities.

resident-evil-4.name: Resident Evil 4
resident-evil-4.story: Resident Evil 4 is a remake of the 2005 survival horror game Resident Evil 4. The game follows Leon S. Kennedy as he travels to a remote European village to rescue the President's daughter.
resident-evil-4.gameplay: Resident Evil 4 is a third-person survival horror game with a focus on action and exploration. The game features updated graphics and gameplay, as well as a new story mode.

super-mario-bros-wonder.name: Super Mario Bros. Wonder
super-mario-bros-wonder.story: Super Mario Bros. Wonder is a sequel to the 2017 3D platformer Super Mario Odyssey. The game follows Mario, Luigi, Peach, Daisy, Yoshi, and Toad as they travel to a new world to stop Bowser from stealing the Star Rod.
super-mario-bros-wonder.gameplay: Super Mario Bros. Wonder is a 3D platformer with a focus on exploration and platforming. The game features new power-ups, worlds, and enemies.

the-legend-of-zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom.name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
the-legend-of-zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom.story: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is a sequel to the 2022 action-adventure game The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. The game follows Link as he travels to a new land to stop a mysterious villain from destroying the world.
the-legend-of-zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom.gameplay: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is a third-person action-adventure game with a focus on exploration and combat. The game features new areas such as the skies above the vast lands of Hyrule, as well as a variety of new enemies and bosses.
